title: Arches National Park: Word Jumble
body: Geology Word Jumble       Geology is the study of the earth's history. One way you can learn about geology is by looking closely at rocks. These eleven words, all geologic features found in Arches National Park, are hidden in the word jumble. They may be hidden horizontally, vertically or diagonally. You can print out the puzzle and circle each word when you find it. arch spire canyon joints fins mountain slick rock natural bridge mesa balanced rock alcove               Once you have the puzzle solved, click here to check your answers.
